ygData.subject: Re: Guide Vision
ygData.msgSnippet: I e-mailed the fellow over at Stratics who did the magician spells list. He told me he recieved the spell lists from Verant.  He also said that it s possible
ygData.messageBody:
I e-mailed the fellow over at Stratics who did the magician spells list.
He told me he recieved the spell lists from Verant. He also said that it's
possible that this spell is a GUIDE ONLY spell which Verant included in the
list they sent him. Who knows....I have yet to hear anyone find it.
My question is why would anyone need it if we have heatstone and
coldstone? What other sight is there to get?

Zolthar

At 07:20 PM 5/11/99 PDT, you wrote:
>From: "Fu Leow" <fyleow@...>
>
>
>Im looking for the spell called Guide Vison for mages (level 16 spell)
>It costs 0 mana and its supposed to increase vision range. I have asked
>Wizzaro (Magician on Karana server) and he said no one has found it yet. Has
>anyone found it yet?
>
>
